title: Peace Paradise Restaurant
typeOfFood: International, Thai, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Restaurant belongs to A resort. Menu has 20+ vegetable dishes, which are listed as vegetarian, not only traditional Thai food (coconut milk based kari/chili), but also tofu (tofu with ginger, chili tofu, etc.). The owner Yay knows the word vegan.
